ygData.subject: Squad Ring.. secret abilities?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm I did this quest when I was a paladin and thought the ring was rather useless, one heal of 80hp and then you need to go back to riverdale to recharge it?
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm I did this quest when I was a paladin and thought the ring was rather
useless, one heal of 80hp and then you need to go back to riverdale to
recharge it? bah!

BUT I heard the rumour that it also has another ability, it reduces tick
time from 5 secs to 2.5 secs. If this is true then this is a MUST have ring
for all warriors. Can anyone please test it and confirm this?

I deleted the character that had done the quest and now I am a DE so its
difficult and time consuming for me to test it. Thanks.
